name: Simulation J.E.R.R.Y
description:
Come work for J.E.R.R.Y. Inc! 

Here at J.E.R.R.Y. Inc, we believe the future of office jobs lies in the realm of Artificial Intelligence. But we can't make that dream a reality without your help.

Introducing Jerry, your new artificial coworker! Using cutting edge machine learning, J.E.R.R.Y. Inc aims to increase productivity in your workplace using the one thing no office worker can live without: coffee.

Your job with J.E.R.R.Y. Inc will be to guide Jerry through a controlled environment using coffee, and minimizing Jerry's exposure to stimulus that could overload his processors.

Featuring: 

  • Five obstacle-course style puzzles for you to solve
  • An environment where basically everything is throwable
  • An original soundtrack that gets more intense when you do so

_ _ _

Created by Ian Stegner

Developed by Ian Stegner, Cypress Reeves and Jorge Aliaga

Designed by Cypress Reeves

Systems Programming by Ian Stegner

3D Art and Animation by Jorge Aliaga

Original Music by Dustin Gartner

Made with Unity

Made using FMOD
